text: Mata arra wa, shinko suru mono no tame ni rei o shimesa reru. Firuaun no tsumadearu. Ka no on'na ga ko itta toki o omoiokoshi nasai. `Omo yo, rakuen no naka no anata no o-gawa ni, watashi no tame ie o o tate kudasai. Soshite firuaun to sono okonai kara, watashi o sukui, fugi o okonau mono kara, watashi o o sukui kudasai
